Package Controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
Controller.OrderController
public class OrderController extends Object
Controller class handling the restaurant's orders.

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      public int createOrder​(int orderID, int resID, int creatorID, ArrayList<Integer> itemIndices, ArrayList<Integer> itemQtys, ArrayList<Integer> setIndices, ArrayList<Integer> setQtys, String memberID)
      Creates an order based on the given input.
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order
      resID - the ID of the customer's reservation
      creatorID - the ID of the order's creator
      itemIndices - the indices of the menu items in the order
      itemQtys - the quantities of the respective items
      setIndices - the indices of the sets in the order
      setQtys - the quantities of the respective sets
      memberID - the member ID of the customer, "no" if not a member
      Returns:
      the table number of the order

    • viewOrder

      public int viewOrder​(int idOrder)
      Displays an order with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      idOrder - ID of the order
      Returns:
      1 if successfully displayed, -1 if order not found

    • removeOrder

      public int removeOrder​(int idOrder)
      Removes an order with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      idOrder - ID of the order to be removed
      Returns:
      1 if successfully removed, -1 if order not found

    • addItemToOrder

      public int addItemToOrder​(int idOrder, int quantity, int menuItemID)
      Adds a menu item to an order with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      idOrder - ID of the order
      quantity - Quantity of the item
      menuItemID - ID of the menu item
      Returns:
      1 if successfully added, -1 if item or order not found

    • addSetToOrder

      public int addSetToOrder​(int idOrder, int quantity, int promoSetID)
      Adds a promotion set to an order with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      idOrder - ID of the order
      quantity - Quantity of the set
      promoSetID - ID of the menu set
      Returns:
      1 if successfully added, -1 if set or order not found

    • removeItemFromOrder

      public int removeItemFromOrder​(int idOrder, int quantity, int menuItemID)
      Removes a menu item from an order with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      idOrder - ID of the order
      quantity - Quantity of the item
      menuItemID - ID of the menu item
      Returns:
      1 if successfully removed, -1 if item or order not found
